name: maat-omni-alignment-engine
description: MA'AT Omni-Alignment Engine with CI/CD Pipeline

scripts.validate: node -e "try { const data = require('fs').readFileSync('logs/logs_result.json', 'utf8'); JSON.parse(data); console.log('✓ logs_result.json is valid'); } catch(e) { console.error('✗ logs_result.json validation failed:', e.message); process.exit(1); }"

author: Alen Gluhic
